child teaches mother to make a figure jump over a small figure , run around a larger figure , and then sit on the bench. Child is unsuccessful and the next task is attempted.

plays with toys in a novel way .

CHAT.comment: child teaches mother to string beads; first a round bead and then a square one. There is never really any attempt on the child's part to do any teaching nor is there any encouragement from the mother.

again talks quietly as he plays with beads
